scripts.start: concurrently -c blue,cyan,magenta "webpack --env=development --watch --config webpack.config.server.js" "webpack --env=development --watch --config webpack.config.client.js" "nodemon --watch public/server public/server/bundle.js"
scripts.build: rimraf -rf public && webpack --env=production --progress --config webpack.config.server.js && webpack --env=production --progress --config webpack.config.client.js
